response.original_title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Equal Pay - The Horowitz Women
response.overview: Mother and daughter radiologists talk about their careers. The mother opened her own practice because no one would hire a doctor who might become pregnant. The daughter enjoys work and motherhood.
response.tagline: Mother and daughter radiologists talk about their career experiences.
response.title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Equal Pay - The Horowitz Women
